derivation: from a compound of G2095 (εὐοδόω) and G3598 (εὐοδόω);
strongs_def: to help on the road, i.e. (passively) succeed in reaching; figuratively, to succeed in business affairs
outline:
1. to grant a prosperous and expeditious journey, to lead by a direct and easy way
  2. to grant a successful issue, to cause to prosper
  3. to prosper, be successful
